title: Bodacious: Master of Disaster
description: The master of disaster is ready to rumble and he’s taking no prisoners. You’ll see why only seven men have ever completed their rides on this 1800lb charbray bull and why Bodacious strikes fear in the hearts of world champion bull riders. He kicks! He slams! He’ll crush your face!… and it’s all here for the first time ever in one heart stopping home video. Featuring unforgettable rides by the world’s greatest bull riders including: Ty Murray, Terry Don West, Greg Schlosser, Dax Lackey, and Tuff Hedeman’s history making 95 point ride on this terrifying animal.
